content.text:
I don't know why everyone makes such a big deal about cryptocurrencies -- they're so easy to invest in! Here's my foolproof four-step program to investing in cryptocurrencies:

1. Wait until the all-time high.
2. Buy!
3. Wait until the all-time low.
4. Sell!

Lather, rinse, and repeat until you run out of money. It's *that* easy!
